title.rendered: Internship at Frost & Sullivan, Mumbai [6-months; UG/PG]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Internship at Frost & Sullivan, Mumbai. Check the eligibility and details below!

About Frost & Sullivan

Frost & Sullivan, the Growth Pipeline Company, has spent more than 60 years partnering with clients to develop transformational growth strategies by focusing on innovation and growth opportunities driven by disruptive technologies, mega trends, emerging markets, and new business models. Today, more than ever before, companies must innovate not only to survive but also to thrive in the future.

About Team

Mobility is one of the most successful business units at Frost & Sullivan. The individual in this role will have the opportunity to leverage the company’s extensive expertise, comprehensive reports, and established relationships. Additionally, Frost & Sullivan will provide the necessary support, training, and tools to ensure the individual’s success in the position.

Internship Details

An Intern is expected to support project team members and the project manager in research and ensuring the integrity of the research process, the validity of project content, and the development of detailed business and market strategies.

Responsibilities

  • Collect a range of data and intelligence on primary and secondary research.
  • Support the development of critical industry insights
  • Provide project-based support in terms of data collection, interviews, etc as needed for Research, Advisory or marketing groups for our automotive vertical within Frost & Sullivan.

Qualifications

  • Recent graduate with bachelor’s/master’s in Engineering , finance or related
  • Self-driven and able to work independently
  • Understanding of market research and/or strategic marketing techniques
  • Primary and Secondary research skills
  • Excellent verbal and written communication in English
  • Responsive to critical situations / adherence to timelines and milestones
  • Excellent in MS suite (word, excel and PowerPoint) and preferably MS project
  • A self-starter invested in your future
  • A persuasive communicator
  • Deeply Analytical

What will make you succeed at Frost & Sullivan?

You need to be-

  • Wildly curious and entrepreneurial
  • Committed to customer success
  • A self-starter invested in your future
  • A persuasive communicator
  • Deeply Analytical
  • Excited about Disruptive Trends

How to Apply?

Interested and eligible candidates can apply here!

Location

Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Benefits

  • A friendly work environment with an ‘open door’ policy
  • A strong career path with growth opportunities.
  • Be part of a global team that strives for excellence, and fosters an Olympic spirit
  • Feed your intellectual curiosity by collaborating across all levels of the company across the globe
  • Continuous learning and coaching

Click here to view the Internship at Frost & Sullivan, Mumbai.
